participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Alex is passionate, introspective, and values deep connections with his family and friends.
participant_1.background: I treasure a handmade ring from my brother. I have been deployed away from home for a long time, and I miss my family. I have a soft spot for crooners, probably because of my grandmother's love for Frank Sinatra. I cannot do math. I've never met my father.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is creative, sociable, and has a whimsical side that loves cats and music.
participant_2.background: I'm not great at keeping up with my family, but I'm trying to be better. I went to a local metal show for my last birthday. When people don't like my social media posts, it upsets me. I used to wear a lot of black because it was easy to put together outfits. I am single and live with my three cats.

content.text: I'm doing alright. I recently went to my first metal show for my birthday.
Oh that sounds fun! What band did you see?
I saw a local band called The Black Dahlia Murder.
Oh, I've heard of them! They're pretty good.
Yeah, they were really good live.
What's your favorite type of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I'm really into metal and rock.
Me too! I love heavy music.
Yeah, it's so much fun to headbang and scream along with the music.
I know right? It's the best!
I'm glad we can relate on that.
Me too! I don't know many people who like heavy music.
Yeah, me neither. It's nice to meet someone who does.
